title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and list models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, create models with simple async/sync API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain LLM, Chat, and Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed 'Open WebUI'); supports RAG, multimodal, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Terminal UI for chatting with Ollama models; markdown, syntax highlighting, conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, embed with fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, and manage models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI backend, NextChat frontend, function-calling, RAG, fine-tuning snippets.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate for Ollama; async client with tokio, strongly typed requests/responses.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Native n8n node to integrate Ollama chat & generate actions into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local LLM assistance to your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Bolt JS and Ollama for private/local AI answers.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: Official .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embed, pull, list with async enumerable streams.

title: ollama-unity
summary: Unity plugin to call Ollama models from C# scripts for NPC dialogue and procedural storytelling.
